title: AWS ML Data Engineering to Azure ML Data Prep: Machine Learning Data Pipelines
description: Master machine learning data engineering by implementing AWS ML data pipelines and migrating to Azure ML data preparation equivalents with feature engineering, data validation, ML-specific ETL, and automated data quality for machine learning workloads.
learningObjectives: Build ML-specific data pipelines using AWS Glue and Azure Data Factory for ML
Implement feature engineering and transformation workflows for ML datasets
Create data validation and quality monitoring for machine learning pipelines
Design feature stores and ML data versioning with SageMaker and Azure ML
Build automated data preprocessing and feature extraction workflows
Implement ML data governance and lineage tracking across both platforms
prerequisites: Completion of DEA-C01 Data Engineer Associate labs or equivalent data engineering experience
Understanding of machine learning concepts and data science workflows
Basic knowledge of Python, pandas, and data manipulation libraries
Familiarity with statistical concepts and data analysis techniques
businessScenario: MLOps Innovations develops machine learning solutions for financial fraud detection, customer recommendation systems, and predictive analytics. They need robust ML data engineering pipelines that ensure data quality, feature consistency, and automated preprocessing. The ML engineering team must master both AWS and Azure ML data platforms to build scalable, reliable data pipelines that support model development, training, and inference while maintaining data governance and compliance.

troubleshooting.issue: Feature engineering pipeline performance bottlenecks with large datasets
troubleshooting.solution: Implement parallel processing, optimize data formats (Parquet, Delta), use distributed computing frameworks, implement intelligent sampling, and optimize feature transformation algorithms

troubleshooting.issue: Data quality issues and feature drift affecting model performance
troubleshooting.solution: Implement comprehensive data validation, use statistical monitoring, implement automated drift detection, create data quality alerts, and establish data contracts with upstream systems

troubleshooting.issue: Complex feature dependencies and versioning across ML teams
troubleshooting.solution: Implement feature store with proper versioning, use feature lineage tracking, establish feature governance policies, implement automated testing, and create feature documentation standards
